InstalledItem.Name: RSI Self Destruct Long
InstalledItem.Description: RSI Self Destruct Long

InstalledItem.Name: Chernykh
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Chernykh is named after the famed 26th century engineer who designed some of the most prized radars of that era. This medium radar from WillsOp celebrates both the look and performance of those classic components.

InstalledItem.Name: TurboDrive
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Amon & Reese Co.
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

The TurboDrive is a common military-grade power plant from A&R that slightly favors performance over durability and stealth.

InstalledItem.Name: Permafrost
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Military

Designed by Aegis to military standards, the Permafrost cooler has proven itself time and again to be more than capable of handling heat processing even while under the strains of combat.

InstalledItem.Name: Permafrost
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Military

Designed by Aegis to military standards, the Permafrost cooler has proven itself time and again to be more than capable of handling heat processing even while under the strains of combat.

InstalledItem.Name: Yeager
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Wei-Tek
Size: 2
Grade: B
Class: Military

Whether you’re rushing to the rescue or simply patrolling through a sector, the Yeager quantum drive from Wei-Tek allows for greater performance when you need it most.

InstalledItem.Name: SecureShield
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 2
Grade: D
Class: Military

Get military-grade protection for your ship with the SecureShield from Gorgon Defender Industries. Their cutting edge emitter tech allows for superior shield absorption across the spectrum of damage types.

InstalledItem.Name: SecureShield
InstalledItem.Description:

Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries

Get military-grade protection for your ship with the SecureShield from Gorgon Defender Industries. Their cutting edge emitter tech allows for superior shield absorption across the spectrum of damage types.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-442 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 4xS2

Behring’s MSD-442 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.
